org.jetel.data.formatter

Class XLSXDataFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.formatter.AbstractFormatter
      • org.jetel.data.formatter.XLSFormatter
        • org.jetel.data.formatter.XLSXDataFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, Formatter

    public class XLSXDataFormatter
extends XLSFormatter
    Represents a XLSX data formatter based on the Apache POI library.
    Since:
    30th January 2009

    • Constructor Detail

      • XLSXDataFormatter

        public XLSXDataFormatter(boolean append,
                 boolean removeSheets)
        Creates a XLSX data formatter.
        Parameters:
        append - determines whether the new data should be appended to the old data or replace them
        removeSheets - indicates if all sheets are to be removed from a file

    • Method Detail

      • setDataTarget

        public void setDataTarget(java.lang.Object dataTarget)
        Description copied from interface: Formatter
        Sets output data destination. Some of formatters allow to call this method repeatedly.

      • prepareSheet

        public void prepareSheet()
        Description copied from class: XLSFormatter
        Prepares sheet in xls file, which was set by method setSheetName(String sheetName) or setSheetNumber(int sheetNumber) for saving data. If any of above methods wasn't called there is created new sheet with default name.
        Specified by:
        prepareSheet in class XLSFormatter

      • prepareSheet

        public void prepareSheet(DataRecord dataRecord)
        Description copied from class: XLSFormatter
        Prepares sheet in xls file, which name is created from given record. Before calling this method, setKeyFields(String[]) method must be called.
        Specified by:
        prepareSheet in class XLSFormatter
